body:
Hi,
I have installed Gromacs 2020 version with following configuration-
Case 1. Manually- with Intel 2018.5, Intel-mkl , simd=AVX2_256, without CUDA support.
Case 2. compiled Gromacs with spack utility with below variant-
       "gromacs@2020%intel@18.0.5 build_type=RelWithDebInfo ~cuda~double~double_precision~hwloc~mdrun_only+mpi+openmp~plumed+rdtscp+shared simd=AVX2_256 arch=linux-centos7-skylake_avx512"

After Running same benchmark for both cases, Manually installed Gromacs uses all availabe cores with 100% utilization while spack built gromacs uses only 50% of available core . 

Can you please help in this matter?

Thanks in advance
title: Gromacs: Performance degrades with spack build compared to manually build Gromacs
